column4: One more.  I have two hard drives in my Ubuntu PC.  One has OS and other is all storage.  The 2nd is new fast 200gig HD.  OS is old slow 6gig.  Can I buy new OS hard drive and somehow make an exact copy?
you can use partimage to image the small drive.. reinstall onto the new drive and then use gparted from live cd to make it larger
tuxus or just nano without the sudo will let you read it without editing priv. too.
